sentences.en: A marriage was a tender relationship resulting from the overflow of feeling.
sentences.cn: 婚姻是一种温柔的关系,渊源于感情的洋溢.

sentences.en: For out of the overflow of the heart the mouth speaks.
sentences.cn: 因为心里所充满的,口里就说出来.
她在挤满的群众面前唱歌.

sentences.en: Her grace, quickness, her social felicities - seemed the overflow of a bounteous nature.
sentences.cn: 她端庄的仪态, 敏捷的反应, 伶俐的口才都似乎是多余的了.

sentences.en: I found a smaller hall for the overflow from the main meeting.
sentences.cn: 我找了个小礼堂容纳主会场所容纳不了的人.

sentences.en: Pour in some of the broth, but not all of it, because it will probably overflow.
sentences.cn: 倒入部分肉汤，不要全部，因为很可能会溢出来。

sentences.en: Pour in some of the syrup, but not all of it, as it will probably overflow.
sentences.cn: 倒一些糖浆进去，但别全倒，因为可能会溢出来。

sentences.en: She could not help her tears, and yielded to the overflow.
sentences.cn: 她禁不住热泪盈眶, 接着就听凭眼泪流了下来.

sentences.en: Tents have been set up next to hospitals to handle the overflow.
sentences.cn: 医院旁搭起了帐篷以安置容纳不下的人员。

sentences.en: The drains flooded and water overflowed down the main street.
sentences.cn: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

sentences.en: The loch's overflow cascades into the waterfalls of a Japanese water garden.
sentences.cn: 溢出的湖水倾泻而下，形成了一座日式水景花园的瀑布。

sentences.en: The overflow from the bath ran on to the floor.
sentences.cn: 浴缸里的水溢到了地板上.

sentences.en: The river had overflowed its banks.

sentences.cn: 那些河里的水漫过了河岸。

sentences.en: The water butt catches the overflow from this pipe.
sentences.cn: 大水桶盛接管子里流出的东西.

sentences.en: There is an overflow of cheap ballpoint pens in the market.
There was an overflow of strength into her intelligence.
sentences.cn: 把她风发的意气横溢到她的才智中去了.

words.tran_cn: 充满，洋溢；泛滥；超值；溢值

phrases.tran_cn: 栈溢出；堆叠溢位；堆栈上限溢位

trans.tran_cn: 泛滥，溢出物，溢流管，充溢，过多，超出额
trans.tran_en: the amount of something or the number of people that cannot be contained in a place because it is already full
if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges
if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges
if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges
if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

trans.tran_cn: 溢出，淹没，挤满，充满，洋溢，资源过剩
